Health Execllence

Sound Health

Our vision in Med-In specialist Hospital is to be a one-stop hospital that provides fully integrated Medicare solutions and health-related services to Nigeria populace and beyond. And our core values are: Empathy, Professionalism, Innovation, Patient Satisfaction and Integrity.

About Us

Who We Are

Med-In Specialist Hospital is committed to provide general medical care with safe and ethical medical treatment to its patients with love and care by applying quality management system through continual improvement of the process.

The Highest Quality Care

Your health matters too much to us and that’s why we provide the highest quality care

Trusted Doctors

Our doctors are some of the brightest minds with years of experience

Health Excellence

We do not only provide top notch health care but also excel at doing just that

Our Clients

What Our Patients Say

The relationship with other staff is also solid. We all work together to achieve the purpose of the organization. The feedback we give from our patients shows we're on top of our game and gives us better idea on how to serve the general public. Med-In is already a household name around Ogudu and it environs. However, we're doing our best to get better and serve the general public better.

Obaje Peter

My first day at work was pretty interesting and i was in a joyful mood. My experience so far has been that every day my learning curve keeps rising and at Med-In, I believe that the sky is my starting point. On my relationship with people and the management, it has been quite high and we have a management that visible and always listening to its staff. The management and staffs at Med-In are one big happy family..

Anonymous

My name is Odafe Uzonwan, a staff of Med- in specialist hospital. Department (customer service unit) I've been with Med-in for two months now and to be honest i love my job here and I actually get more encouraged by the zealousness of my senior colleagues, I know that we aren't 100% percent prefect as human but we are Sure more than 70% and it is above average, your state of health is our concern and nothing else is important than to see you better and happier. Health is wealth .

Odafe Uzonwan
